header.title: NV usertopics
NV usertopics
header.description: Adds the number of opened user-topics to the number of user-posts on all pages.
Fügt die Anzahl der vom Benutzer eröffneten Themen zu der, der Beiträge in sämtlichen Dateien hinzu.
header.author-notes: Die MOD untersützt die "MOD Version Check"-MOD von Handymman´: http://www.phpbb.com/community/viewtopic.php?f=69&t=691155

action-group.diy-instructions: Don't forget to clear the cache! After the install, you have to resynchronise it. Therefor go to the ACP and do it (on the first page) If you want me to add your language file to the download, just leave me a pm: http://www.phpbb.com/community/ucp.php?i=pm&mode=compose&u=315319
